title: Natural gas prices for households in Germany 2010 - 2018 , semi-annually
summary: Overall Euro cents per kilowatt-hour has decreased over the Year.
Euro cents per kilowatt-hour is roughly constant from 2014_S2 to 2015_S2, gradually decreasing from 2015_S2 to 2017_S1, and finally roughly constant from 2017_S1 to 2018_S1.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2016_S2 and 2017_S1.
Maximum Euro cents per kilowatt-hour, about 6.81 was reported at Year 2014_S2, and 2015_S2
The lowest Euro cents per kilowatt-hour, of value 6.08 was reported at Year 2018_S1
